com.wesleyware.daowiz.fieldtypes
Class DoubleField

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--com.wesleyware.daowiz.Field
        |
        +--com.wesleyware.daowiz.fieldtypes.DoubleField
public class DoubleField
extends Field

This is an immutable object representaion of a Double field. It is used in the construction of a DB record object.

Author:
Wesley Williams
